column3: The nonplussed noblewoman is looking up into the parapets with a panicked expression.
A noblewoman's beloved pet has gotten itself into quite a pickle. She has found her way up onto the roof and cannot get down. Help the poor thing get back down to the ground.
You rescue the kitten. It is suspiciously coeurl-like, but take it back to the noblewoman anyway─she promised a reward!

The woman is overjoyed to have her pet back safe and sound. You try to inform her that it seems more like a coeurl pup than a cat, but she is thoroughly convinced that it is an adorable kitten. All you can do now is to pray for her safety.
Deliver the pet to the noblewoman.
The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten peers over the ledge apprehensively.
Oh, my baby! My poor, poor baby! How did you get up there!?
<sob> Oh, whatever shall I do? It's so high up... Please, somebody do something!
You'll help me, won't you!? Please! I promise you'll be repaid! Please save my poor kitty!
Please! Save my poor kitty! Please!
The suspiciously coeurl-like kitten pounces into your arms.
Do you have her? Do you have my dear, dear kitty?
There you are, you silly little thing. You had me so <Emphasis>worried</Emphasis>!
...What? You think my dear little kitty isn't really a cat? She's really a coeurl!?
Hahahaha! To think I almost believed you for a second there! My dear little kitty isn't some man-eating monster. Just look at her! Look how cute she is!
